title: Brick Game Classic
description: Brick Game Classic is a classic Tetris online game. If you are a fan of classic games, then this game that has been popular for many years is just right for you. When any row or column is filled, it is eliminated. You can change the shape of the cubes before they fall to eliminate them quickly. You can also make them fall faster if you are satisfied with their shape. Now join the world of fun games.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cat Challenge
description: Meet the game Cat Challenge, where at each level the cat will patiently wait until you drop him a round colored candy disc. To do this, you need to cut the rope on which the candy dangles. But first, think about which side to do this and take into account the items that are on the playing field, they must be used to achieve the goal. The candy is not always directly above the cat, so it needs to be moved somehow.
instructions: Use the mouse or tap on the screen to play the game.

title: Block Stacking
description: Block Stacking is a very fun, leisure, and pressure-relieving game. The game is very delicate and fresh. In the game, you will play by combining many different fruits. As long as you can complete the target tasks, you will have a chance to get rewards! By eliminating the fruits on the screen, you can successfully pass the level. It's extremely easy to operate, which makes you feel very addicted. Come and try the game!
instructions: Mouse or tap to play.

title: Seek & Find
description: Dive into a fun puzzle hidden object game with intrigue and excitement in "Seek & Find-Hidden Object Game," where keen eyes and quick wits reign supreme. This scavenger hunt game invites players of all ages to find hidden objects through beautifully crafted scenes, exploring maps and secrets skillfully concealed within. With a blend of charm and challenge, this fun hidden object game is designed to captivate, entertain, and test your observational skills like never before!
instructions: Mouse/Touchpad: 1. Click or tap to select and highlight hidden objects. 2. Drag to move around the scene for a better view. 3. Scroll to zoom in and out.

title: Hexa Sort
description: Hexa Sort offers a delightful blend of puzzle challenges, strategic matching, and satisfying merging experience. Engage your mind with stimulating brain games that involve clever puzzle solving and logical maneuvers, making it an ideal choice for those seeking a mental workout.
instructions: drag and Drop the Hexa tile to build the peak tower

title: Sort Resort
description: Unleash your creativity and puzzle-solving skills in this unique game! Your mission: sort colorful liquids into the right flasks while also drawing beautiful pictures. Each level challenges you with tricky sorting tasks, but there's more — as you pour and sort, stunning images will come to life! Enjoy a relaxing yet engaging experience that blends art and logic. Can you master both sorting and drawing? Play now and find out how fun and satisfying it can be!
instructions: Welcome to the game! Here's how to play: Your task is to sort the liquids into the correct flasks. Tap a flask to pour the liquid into another until each color is sorted into its own flask. Be careful not to overflow! As you sort, a hidden picture will gradually reveal itself. Keep sorting until the image is complete. If you get stuck, use the undo button to go back a step. Ready to test your skills? Start now and enjoy sorting liquids while creating beautiful pictures!

title: 2048 Number Match
description: Indulge your brain and enjoy puzzle-solving and number-matching. Achieve the highest possible score and boast about your brain-power!
instructions: Connect matching or the next multiplied numbers to raise the value of the tiles even more. Use power-ups to achieve the highest number you can.

title: Jigsaw M
description: the jigsaw game includes dozens of different puzzles. you can increase or decrease the number of pieces of these puzzles as you wish. so you can make it suitable for all ages. you can have a pleasant time by having fun and exercising your brain. come on we are waiting for you.
instructions: drag and drop the puzzle pieces

title: Missile Launch Master
description: Experience the thrill of Boom Missile 3D, a 3D simulation game that will test your missile skills. You will play as a missile pilot who must dodge hot air balloons and helicopters in the sky. You will also have to fly the missile over an island and hit the target before the time runs out. Boom Missile 3D is a game that combines stunning 3D graphics and smooth controls. You will feel like you are in the cockpit of a real missile. Can you complete all the missions and destroy the enemy’s base?
instructions: Drag to control the missile

title: Pet Connect Match
description: Pet Connect Match is an interesting matching game, in this game, you need to connect the same pets to eliminate all of them. There are many different modes you can choose, you can pass levels, challenge time mode or just play without any limit. Have a good time!
instructions: Click or tap to play

title: Pop Them!
description: Link 3 or more emojis of the same color! Link them in any direction to connect them all! Reach the goal within the limited number of moves Pop the bubbles around the boxes or evil emojis to destroy them Use power-ups to accomplish your mission!
instructions: Link 3 or more same color to pop Emojies! Link 10 and get ultra merge!

title: Airways Maze
description: This is an Airway game. You have to create the path/airway to move the plane from left to right without colliding any blocks. When you complete the level then unlock the next level. You have 100 levels now. But I will add more levels every 100 downloads. Enjoy!
instructions: There are two modes, mouse and touch. You have to tap or click on the left side of the screen and create the path by dragging to move the plane to the right side.

title: Guess The Drawing
description: This is a casual puzzle game where you draw and I guess. Maybe you've played a game like that before, where someone draws on your back and you draw on the front, and then you see if you agree. If you like that kind of game, then this game is for you. In this game, you need to memorize what the person behind you draws.You can use the coins you get to buy the brushes you need. Come and experience this new and interesting game world.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Farm Block Puzzle
description: This is the perfect game to satisfy your craving for a logical tetris-inspired game with a fresh spin on it. The countryside aesthetic will capture your attention with its beautiful graphics and lovely music.
instructions: Place the blocks of different shapes on the screen to completely fill out rows and columns to eliminate them.

title: Blocksss
description: Blocksss is challenging, exciting and sometimes infuriating minimalist puzzle game. Enjoy the world's most beloved puzzle game for FREE! Easy to play, and pleasurable game for all ages.
instructions: Blocksss - Drag block, Fill up the square

title: Uncle Bullet 007
description: Play as Uncle Bullet, a retired spy who’s back in the game to take down rival agents and save the day. Armed with an arsenal of bouncy bullets, you’ll use your wits and quick reflexes to outmaneuver foes and rescue hostages. Shoot your bullets at walls, ceilings, and floors to make them bounce, ricochet, and curve around corners to hit your targets.
instructions: Defeat secret agent enemies with bouncing bullets. Rescue hostages.

title: Letters Match
description: Letters Match combines the best of the games you love. This is a mixture of matching games, word search and clearing the playing field. We took all these ingredients and spiced it up with exciting gameplay. If you like to stretch your brain with puzzles, then Letters Match is what you need!
instructions: - Choose 2 letters in the correct combination. The correct combination includes not only pairs of identical letters, but also magic words; they can be looked up in a magic dictionary. - Letters can be selected vertically, horizontally and diagonally. - If you get stuck, use the hint. - Clear all cells of the field. - Earn points, level up and get rewards! - Discover all the “magic” words and play with those that bring you good luck!

title: That's Not My Neighbor
description: That's Not My Neighbor is a detective puzzle game. You are going to be the new janitor in this building when you are watching the tutorial video. Your job is to determine if the person who wants to enter the building is a monster. The monsters can transform into anyone and imitate them. Some monsters are not good at imitation and may develop flaws. You have no choice but to pay attention to the image of your neighbors. At the same time, remember to fill out checklists for each neighbor.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mahjong Earth
description: Immerse yourself in the serene beauty of Mahjong Earth! This captivating game offers a tranquil escape with its soothing earth-themed soundtrack and stunning tile designs. Explore over 250+ unique puzzle layouts, each more challenging than the last. Use the Combo meter to match quickly and earn stars. Climb the leaderboard for recognition and claim boosters by reaching the top. Immerse in the relaxing soundtrack and earthy tiles for a truly calming experience!
instructions: Find and match identical tiles, ensuring they're not trapped and have at least one side open, matching to make them vanish and aiming to clear the tiles. Use Shuffle, Torch, or Hint when stuck and enjoy endless puzzles, clear tiles, get stars, and experience the art of relaxation in Solitaire Mahjong Earth!

title: 100 Rooms Escape
description: This is a brain-burning and challenging escape room online game. Interesting gameplay so you won't get bored. You need to open 100 doors to escape the room. Interact with objects and solve puzzles to complete the tasks in the escape game. Solve the puzzles, and take inventory of the hidden items. You may use them to open the room, move on to the next level, use your skills, and do whatever it takes to escape.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Poppy Player Puzzle
description: Solve the riddle of this fun game. In each of the many stages of Poopy Player Puzzle, the small player must use his or her wits to direct the doll to the right keys that will release it from captivity.The goal of the game is to rescue the small doll from Poppy's clutches to progress through the levels, you'll need to keep an eye on the things in the labyrinth; pressing certain buttons may speed up the game or remove hazards.
instructions: Play by dragging the player's hand to the key, then hit the corresponding button to unleash the level's traps. Navigate the labyrinth in the right way. Controls Use the mouse to play or touch the screen on touch devices.

title: Beauty puzzle
description: A puzzle game in which you need to connect the pieces in a line. To successfully complete the game, it is important to use its mechanics to your advantage
instructions: 1. Connecting the lines will be easy at first, but as time goes by, the speed will increase. Once you connect a line, it will disappear and earn you points! If the playing field overflows and a piece is on a line and stays on it for a long time, you will lose and start the game over! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse to control the game. Tap the screen to make the figure scroll or swipe down to make the figure fall. 3. enjoy the game, become the leader and top the list!

title: Block Puzzle Cats
description: Train your brain and solve puzzles with cute cats! Drag and drop the cats onto the puzzle board and try to put them all together! Unique puzzle shapes and ever-changing challenges will train your brain to think in a whole new way. Can you fit all the cats in? Collect cute new cats as you beat each puzzle challenge.Now come and join the fun and challenging game world.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Puzzle lub
description: In this puzzle game you need to connect the pieces in a line. To successfully complete the game, use its mechanics to your advantage.
instructions: 1. Connecting the lines will be easy at first, but the speed will increase with time. As soon as you connect a line, it will disappear and you will get points! If the playing field fills up and the piece remains on the line, you will lose and you will have to start the game again! 2. Press and hold your finger or mouse button to control the game. Tap the screen to make the piece scroll, or swipe down to make it fall. 3. Enjoy the puzzle, become the best and top the leaderboard!

title: Unblock It 3D
description: Power up your logic and spatial reasoning skills with Unblock It 3D! Rotate the cluster of bricks to find unblocked tiles you can slide away without hitting any obstructions. Play Classic Mode and enjoy hundreds of intricate puzzles with unlimited moves, new cube designs and backgrounds to unlock. Or, journey through time in Adventure Mode. Try your hand at 25 additional levels of increasing complexity and size. Explore Ancient Egypt, Medieval Europe, the Aztec Empire, feudal Japan, and more.
instructions: Clear the entire cluster of blocks by sliding them in an open direction. Each cube has an arrow on it. If it’s not blocked by other bricks, you can swipe it away. Tap and drag to spin the camera around the big cube. Search all sides and discover your next move. Watch out - the blocks come in different sizes! In adventure mode, you also have to keep an eye on the limited move count. Think strategically to avoid wasting moves on blocked tiles.

title: Magic Finger Puzzle 3d
description: Magic Finger Puzzle 3D is an interesting casual puzzle online game. You have an amazing pair of hands that can fire the laser. It can help you smash the cages that are holding you. It can also launch boxes onto barricades so that you can escape from the cage without stepping on spikes and dying. But don't worry, you need to use your ingenuity to make good use of those amazing hands. All difficulties will be solved. Join the game if you want to try a journey full of adventure.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Dinosaur Cards
description: Explore, match, conquer! Dino challenge! Win by matching sets of dinosaurs faster than time runs out. Dive into dino fun today!
instructions: Dinosaur Cards immerses you in the world of puzzles and prehistoric beasts. Stack colorful dinosaur cards and solve the puzzle beneath. Time's ticking, so be quick! Win by matching sets faster than time runs out. Dive into dino fun today!

title: Huggy Wuggy Guess the right door
description: In Huggy Wuggy -Guess the right door you have to find your way through a maze like factory, choosing the right way. In each room there are 3 doors, but behind one of them you will find Huggy Wuggy. You have to go through 50 rooms if you want to find the exit. Try your best and leave this haunted place as fast as you can!
instructions: Touch the gate to open it

title: Fill The Bottle
description: Fill The Bottle is a puzzle online game for all ages. The design of the canisters is different at each level, which makes you think about how to get the ball in the limited space without crossing the line. Test your skill in maneuvering the balls and pass the levels with increasing difficulty.This fun and addictive game will keep you hooked as you come up with clever ways to place the balls and unlock all the levels!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Dop Puzzle Erase Master
description: It is an interesting online game that will take you to an unparalleled puzzle-solving experience. To solve the puzzles, you may use your imagination and ingenuity. You need to consider what do I erase to pass the level. Within the challenging levels, you need to use strategic thinking to conquer each puzzle. In each level, you must make use of the eraser to erase a part of the picture to show a hidden object or scene. The deletion puzzles are easy to learn, but challenging to master.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Picture Puzzles
description: the picture puzzles includes dozens of different puzzles. you can increase or decrease the number of pieces of these puzzles as you wish. so you can make it suitable for all ages. you can have a pleasant time by having fun and exercising your brain. come on we are waiting for you.
instructions: touch click

title: Puzzle Box Brain Fun
description: Puzzle Box - Brain Fun is a brain game containing multiple modes. Different levels of difficulty and gameplay are waiting for you to unlock! Challenge your intelligence while enjoying casual games! Come and challenge Puzzle Box - Brain Fun to test your IQ and play with your brain! Start when you are ready and show your strength!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hexa Sort Master
description: Let's sort some hexa blocks on the hexa tiles. Hexa blocks consist of colorful pieces. Place the same colored pieces side by side and match them to stack all hexas over one tile. A great puzzle game begins with colorful hexa blocks! Sort the stacks side by side and try to destroy them making hexa towers. Match the same colors with each other. Exercise and improve your brain skills. More than 200 levels are waiting for you!
instructions: Use MOUSE and LEFT-CLICK to drag and drop hexa stacks. Use touch controls on your mobile device/tablet. Match the same colored hexa blocks and destroy them. Try to achieve the goal at each level.

title: Forest Tiles
description: There are several coins on the 9 by 9 playing field. It is necessary to place the blocks on the playing field in such a way as to completely assemble a vertical or horizontal line. Gold coins can be used to reset unnecessary blocks and continue the game if you lose.
instructions: Three blocks appear on the left of the playing field, which must be placed on the playing field in order to assemble a horizontal or rotating line.

title: Pixel Art
description: With pixel art, paint cubes with the right colors and create pixel art. the right colors and cubes are waiting for you to paint
instructions: Use the mouse to click.

title: Hexagon
description: Embark on a merging frenzy with "Hexagon"! Place hexagonal tiles on the board, watch them merge and multiply. Create chain reactions and earn points as you strategically fill the hexagonal grid. Can you reach the ultimate merge and trigger the explosive power of 512? Play now and test your merging skills!
instructions: Place one or two tiles at a time and match with adjacent tiles to merge them together. Every merge earns points and merging 512 will clear extra board space.

title: Brain Puzzle Tricky Choices
description: This is a brain puzzle game. In this Brain Puzzle: Tricky Choices game, use your imaginative brain to solve all the tricky brain puzzles, find the right storyline, and then pass the level. It may be easy to get through all the levels, all you need to do is make the right choices, sounds simple but it's not. Join the game and use your imagination and creativity to solve the puzzles!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Hex Triple Match
description: Hex Triple Match brings together puzzle challenges, strategic matching and merging experiences. This game consists of clever puzzle-solving and logical manoeuvres, making it ideal for those seeking a brain workout. You need to consider how to place them to eliminate them faster. Each colour represents an item, giving you a great gaming experience. Beautiful graphics bring you visual enjoyment. Come and join the merging game world.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Brain Find Can You Find It
description: Brain Find brings new brain puzzles! Combine brain power and discovery for a brain challenge like no other! You can use your brain and reverse thinking to get the final target item. The unexpected way of passing levels can bring you endless laughs. The game tests your logical thinking skills, reflexes as well as memory and creativity. Come and experience it and prove that you are the smartest!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Cube Connect
description: Move the blocks and guide the ball to the goal. After a period of time, the ball starts to move. Connect the paths quickly so that the ball doesn't fall. Some blocks can jump and some can warp.
instructions: Drag to move blocks.

title: Jump Ball Classic
description: Jump Ball Classic is the best game to test your reflexes. Move your ball left and right to avoid obstacles and enjoy the thrilling moment! Once it hits, it will fail immediately. Concentrate and challenge for success!
instructions: Tap to jump

title: Jewel Legend Quest
description: The most legendary quest of your life begins! Miners from all around the world have come to get their hands on these precious gems. Join them in the effort and engage in various challenges while trying to dig out as many diamonds as possible.
instructions: Move and match identical diamonds into chains of 3 or more. You will be rewarded with explosive power-ups if you match 4 or more.

title: Incredible Princesses and Villains Puzzle
description: A puzzle game for girls where the player has to collect puzzles with images of princesses and villains. The game features 50 tasks, the difficulty of which is gradually increasing. Each puzzle is unique, which contributes to the development of logical thinking, imagination and fine motor skills of the players. Let's start collecting puzzles and immerse ourselves in a world of magic and adventure with beautiful princesses and dangerous villains!
instructions: The game consists of 50 levels, the difficulty of which is gradually increasing. At each level, you need to assemble a puzzle with some fabulous female character. There is no time limit on the level, but at each level there is a timer. At the end of the game, you can find out the total time spent on completing the game and save this result to share with your friends. Depending on the gaming device, a computer mouse click or a simple touch of the touch screens is used to control.

title: Slidee
description: In this sliding-puzzle game you will have to make your way by painting the walls. Along the way you'll encounter spikes, portals, and collapsing walls.
instructions: Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move / Touch-screen buttons R - Restart Esc - Menu

title: Nugget Man Survival Puzzle
description: Are you ready for adventure with the Nugget man character? To save the Nugget Man character who is stranded in the desert, you must fly into the sky without bursting the balloons. You must be careful to take the character to the finish by solving the puzzles before time runs out, accompanied by Gedagedago music. Rescue Nugget Man through desert bandits, cacti and many other challenging obstacles! Enjoy.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Pet Fall
description: You can move animals from side to side. You have to collect full horizontal lines to make them disappear. Some animals are frozen and must be released twice, some are locked in cages and cannot be moved. Use bonuses when necessary
instructions: Slide Pet blocks and create full lines. Move Pet blocks to empty positions and create full lines to remove lines.

title: Blastify II
description: Blastify II is a new addictive tap-to-blast puzzle game. Easy to pick up and play, this game offers a delightful experience for all ages. With endless entertainment and a steady stream of new puzzles, you can enjoy playing for hours on end.
instructions: In this puzzle game, you should destroy the group of the same colored blocks in the puzzle board by tapping on them. You should collect the remaining blocks until you hit the target. Utilize four unique boosters to blast through obstacles and reach new heights.

title: Destination Brain Test
description: Destination Brain Test is a great puzzle game to text your brain. You only need to drag to launch the ball to destroy all the blocks with various shapes. The farther you go, the more difficult levels you will meet. Luckily, you can try countless times in this game. So, try to challenge it now!
instructions: Drag to launch

title: The Final Riddle
description: It's a unique experimental puzzle game, where all you are given is the title of your current puzzle. If you get the hint, you know what to do, how to arrange the blocks and solve the riddle.
instructions: You see the title of your current puzzle. If you get the hint, you know what to do, how to arrange the blocks and solve the riddle. If not you can use extra clues. At the end of the game the total number of the clues you used to complete all 30 riddles becomes your anti score. And, as it was stated, this is the game you can finish only once, so this number of hints you needed becomes your permanent forever result. This puzzle game is all about riddles, hints and your wits.

title: Kitchen Star
description: Introducing "Kitchen Star," the ultimate puzzle challenge for visual thinkers! In this captivating game, players are tasked with unraveling intricate images by strategically rotating connected chunks of lines. Your mission? Reveal the full image in as few turns as possible by rotating different sections. With each twist and turn, the true picture emerges, but can you decode it before you're all twisted up? Get ready to sharpen your spatial skills and become the ultimate Kitchen Star!
instructions: In each level, an image has been scrambled. Rotate the pieces by pressing the rotation buttons until the image is right again. The fewer moves you use, the better your score!
